channel.title: Comments on: VIDEO: A Place to Bury Strangers “Ego Death”

item.title: By: Eric Greenwood
item.dc:creator: Eric Greenwood
item.description: i'm going to hate you for all the shows you'll get to see up there in dc.
item.content:encoded: i’m going to hate you for all the shows you’ll get to see up there in dc.

item.title: By: Logan K. Young
item.dc:creator: Logan K. Young
item.description: I, too, kind of slept on Exploding head last year - only now getting around to realizing what an incredible record it is. "Ego Death" and "Keep Slipping Away" are two of my favs. They're playing next week in B'more with The Big Pink at Ram's Head. Definitely going! And I also want one of their custom pedals: http://www.deathbyaudio.net/
item.content:encoded:
I, too, kind of slept on Exploding head last year – only now getting around to realizing what an incredible record it is. “Ego Death” and “Keep Slipping Away” are two of my favs. They’re playing next week in B’more with The Big Pink at Ram’s Head. Definitely going! And I also want one of their custom pedals:
http://www.deathbyaudio.net/
